title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jan 3 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jan 3 2022
description:
Clay and Buck kick off 2022. "We missed you all very much, in case you couldn't tell," Buck said -- even though they both enjoyed the various free beach sands of Florida while away. Clay points out they were right about everything they predicted before the holiday break, especially the total collapse of the Biden covid narrative. Little lab coat tyrant Fauci pushes vax mandate to fly. Live with it, libs! Ron DeSantis was right. Everyone on the left, however, was wrong and lying -- now proven by the narrative collapse. Michigan band masks up for the Orange Bowl: Ridiculous!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck
